jokes.question: Did you hear the one about the guy with the broken hearing aid?
What do you call a fly without wings?
What do you call someone with no nose?
What time did the man go to the dentist?
Why can’t you hear a pterodactyl go to the bathroom?
How many optometrists does it take to change a light bulb? 1 or 2?
Why does Waldo only wear stripes?
jokes.answer: Because he doesn't want to be spotted.

jokes.question: Do you know where you can get chicken broth in bulk?
Why are skeletons so calm?
jokes.answer: Because nothing gets under their skin.

jokes.question: Why don’t seagulls fly over the bay?
What did celery say when he broke up with his girlfriend?
jokes.answer: She wasn't right for me, so I really don't carrot all.

jokes.question: What's the worst thing about ancient history class?

jokes.joke: I was thinking about moving to Moscow but there is no point Russian into things.
There’s a new type of broom out, it’s sweeping the nation.
When my wife told me to stop impersonating a flamingo, I had to put my foot down.
I used to work for a soft drink can crusher. It was soda pressing.
A ghost walks into a bar and asks for a glass of vodka but the bar tender says, 'sorry we don’t serve spirits'
I went to the zoo the other day, there was only one dog in it. It was a shitzu.
I gave all my dead batteries away today, free of charge.
